sentence:
…Speaker, as we celebrate Black History  Month, I rise to recognize Joann Williams, a dedicated leader in  Illinois' Fourth Congressional District and a pillar of the LeClaire- Hearst community on Chicago's southwest side.

Joann is a U.S. Army disabled veteran who has dedicated her life to  service both in uniform and in her neighborhood. She has spent…
